attributes.action: Put an end to internal detentions in schools
attributes.background: Ever since I was in school people were getting these, however it has now got worse and people are getting them for minor things even if they haven’t done any thing, this is where they are put in solitary confinement for hours on end

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could start a petition asking the Government to make a specific change to the guidance it gives schools about detentions.
